item.title: Sometimes the majority isn't always right
item.description: In the spring of 2020, my first semester at Allegheny College, I took a software engineering class in the computer science department.

item.title: The photography collection of someone who is not a photographer
item.description: Now don’t get me wrong, I am in NO WAY a professional However, I do enjoy snapping some pictures on my phone every once in a while

item.title: Making a Website is Hard
item.description: I think as a computer science major it is a rite of passage to struggle when trying to make a customized website.
